alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 02 at 8:21PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Florida, including the following county, Hillsborough. * WHEN...Until 945 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 821 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - 1 to 3 inches with locally higher amounts possible. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, Brandon, Fish Hawk, East Lake-Orient Park, Palm River-Clair Mel, Egypt Lake-Leto, University, Riverview, Tampa International Airport, Greater Carrollwood, Lake Magdalene, Citrus Park, West Park, Ybor City, Palm River, Channelside, Orient Park, Davis Islands and University Of Tampa. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
